CustomField.formula: If( amc__Cost_Budget__c = 0, "No Measurement", if((( amc__Cost_Actual__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c ) / amc__Cost_Budget__c)<0.8, "Under Project Budget", if((( amc__Cost_Actual__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c ) / amc__Cost_Budget__c) <=1, "Within Project Budget", "Over Project Budget")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows performance based on Completed Hours + Material Costs + Actual Project Expenses
CustomField.label: Actual Performance
